mapper.select: select USERNO, NICK, AVERAGE, PROFILEIMAGE, extract(year from RECENTLOGONTIME) ||'/'|| extract(month from RECENTLOGONTIME) ||'/'|| extract(day from RECENTLOGONTIME) as RECENTLOGONTIME from users where USERNO = #{userNo}

select DISTINCT ur.USERNO, ur.NICK from plays pl, users ur where pl.gameno in ( select ort.gameNo from ( select rownum rn, ot.gameNo from ( select g.GAMENO from games g, users u, plays p where p.USERNO = u.USERNO AND p.gameno = g.gameno AND u.userno = #{userNo} ORDER BY g.GAMENO DESC) ot )ort where rn >=1 and rn<=3 ) AND ur.userno = pl.userno

select ort.rn recordNo, ort.gameNo, ort.biliardAddress, ort.biliardName, ort.TABLETYPE, ort.GAMETYPE, ort.MEMBERNUM, ort.GAMEDATE, ort.gametime, ort.record, ort.PAYMONEY, ort.calGameTime, ort.ACTIVEAVERAGE, ort.CURRENTAVERAGE, ort.Average from ( select rownum rn, ot.gameNo, ot.biliardAddress, ot.biliardName, ot.TABLETYPE, ot.GAMETYPE, ot.MEMBERNUM, ot.GAMEDATE, ot.gametime, ot.record, ot.PAYMONEY, ot.calGameTime, ot.ACTIVEAVERAGE, ot.CURRENTAVERAGE, ot.Average from ( select g.gameNo, REGEXP_SUBSTR(b.BILIARDADDRESS1, '[^ ]+', 1, 1, 'i') || ' ' || REGEXP_SUBSTR(b.BILIARDADDRESS1, '[^ ]+', 1, 2, 'i') as BILIARDADDRESS, b.biliardName, c.TABLETYPE, g.GAMETYPE, g.MEMBERNUM, extract(year from g.gamedate) ||'/'|| extract(month from g.gamedate) ||'/'|| extract(day from g.gamedate) as GAMEDATE, NVL(trunc(g.gametime/3600)||':'|| lpad(trunc(mod(g.gametime,3600)/60),2,'0')||':'|| lpad(mod(mod(g.gametime,3600),60),2,'0'),0) as gametime, p.record, g.PAYMONEY, g.gametime as calGameTime, p.ACTIVEAVERAGE, p.CURRENTAVERAGE, u.Average from games g, plays p, cueTable c, biliards b, users u where g.gameNo = p.gameNo and g.tableNo = c.tableNo and c.biliardNo = b.biliardNo and p.userno = u.userno and p.userno = #{userNo} and g.gamestatus = 1 order by g.gameNo desc ) ot )ort

select p.PLAYNO, u.NICK, u.Average, p.record, NVL(trunc(p.PLAYTIME/3600)||':'|| lpad(trunc(mod(p.PLAYTIME,3600)/60),2,'0')||':'|| lpad(mod(mod(p.PLAYTIME,3600),60),2,'0'),0) as PLAYTIME, u.userNo, NVL(trunc(tpt.totalPlayTime/3600)||':'|| lpad(trunc(mod(tpt.totalPlayTime,3600)/60),2,'0')||':'|| lpad(mod(mod(tpt.totalPlayTime,3600),60),2,'0'),0) as totalPlayTime, NVL(round(twc.winCount/tgc.totalCount,2),0) as totalWinRate, NVL(round((tgc.totalCount-tlc.loseCount)/tgc.totalCount,2),0) as totalCommRate, tgc.totalCount as totalCountGame, NVL(twc.winCount,0) as totalCountWinGame, NVL(tlc.loseCount,0) as totalCountLoseGame from plays p, users u, games g,
(select userno, sum(playTime) totalPlayTime from plays group by userno)tpt,
(select p.userNo, count(PlayNo) totalCount from plays p, games g, users u where p.gameno = g.gameno and p.CURRENTAVERAGE = u.AVERAGE and g.gamestatus = 1 group by p.userNo) tgc,
(select p.userNo, count(PlayNo) winCount from plays p, games g, users u where p.gameno = g.gameno and p.CURRENTAVERAGE = u.AVERAGE and g.gamestatus = 1 and p.record=1 group by p.userNo) twc,
(select p.userNo, count(PlayNo) loseCount from plays p, games g, users u where p.gameno = g.gameno and p.CURRENTAVERAGE = u.AVERAGE and g.gamestatus = 1 and p.record = g.MEMBERNUM group by p.userNo) tlc
where p.USERNO = u.USERNO AND p.gameno = g.gameno and tpt.userNo = p.userNo and tgc.userNo = p.userNo and twc.userNo(+) = p.userNo and tlc.userNo(+) = p.userNo
AND g.gameNo = #{gameNo}

select nvl(a.winCnt,0) winCnt, nvl(b.loseCnt,0) loseCnt from ( select count(ort.record) winCnt, ort.userno from (select rownum rn, ot.playno, ot.userno, ot.gameno, ot.record from (select p.playno, p.userno, p.gameno, p.record from plays p, games g where g.gameno = p.gameno and p.userno = #{userNo} and g.GAMESTATUS = 1 and p.record = 1 order by p.playno desc) ot )ort where rn >= 1 and rn <= 10 group by ort.userno )a full join ( select count(ort.record) loseCnt, ort.userno from (select rownum rn, ot.playno, ot.userno, ot.gameno, ot.record from (select p.playno, p.userno, p.gameno, p.record, g.memberNum from plays p, games g where p.gameNo = g.gameNo and g.GAMESTATUS = 1 and p.userno = #{userNo} and p.record = g.memberNum order by p.playno desc) ot )ort where rn >= 1 and rn <= 10 group by ort.userno )b
on a.userNo = b.userNo

select DISTINCT u.nick, u.Average, TRUNC(To_date(Sysdate,'YY/MM/DD')) - TRUNC(u.RECENTLOGONTIME) as recentDays, u.userno, NVL(round((tgc.totalCount-tlc.loseCount)/tgc.totalCount,2),0) as totalCommRate, tgc.totalCount as totalCountGame, NVL(tlc.loseCount,0) as totalCountLoseGame from users u, plays p, FAVORITEUSERS f, (select p.userNo, count(PlayNo) totalCount from plays p, games g, users u where p.gameno = g.gameno and p.CURRENTAVERAGE = u.AVERAGE and g.gamestatus = 1 group by p.userNo) tgc,
(select p.userNo, count(PlayNo) loseCount from plays p, games g, users u where p.gameno = g.gameno and p.CURRENTAVERAGE = u.AVERAGE and g.gamestatus = 1 and p.record = g.MEMBERNUM group by p.userNo) tlc
where f.GETUSERNO = u.userno and u.userno = p.userno and tgc.userNo = p.userNo and tlc.userNo(+) = p.userNo and f.setuserno = #{userNo} Order By Nick ASC
